\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Parameters of \mbox{\hyperlink{structVmaAllocation}{Vma\+Allocation}} objects, that can be retrieved using function vma\+Get\+Allocation\+Info(). 

\doxysubsection{Member Data Documentation}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{structVmaAllocationInfo_abaf12cc4e13fbe5208ca6e5bb1a21c19}\label{structVmaAllocationInfo_abaf12cc4e13fbe5208ca6e5bb1a21c19}} 
\index{VmaAllocationInfo@{VmaAllocationInfo}!deviceMemory@{deviceMemory}}
\index{deviceMemory@{deviceMemory}!VmaAllocationInfo@{VmaAllocationInfo}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{deviceMemory}{deviceMemory}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily Vk\+Device\+Memory VMA\+\_\+\+NULLABLE\+\_\+\+NON\+\_\+\+DISPATCHABLE Vma\+Allocation\+Info\+::device\+Memory}



Handle to Vulkan memory object. 

Same memory object can be shared by multiple allocations.

It can change after call to vma\+Defragment() if this allocation is passed to the function, or if allocation is lost.

If the allocation is lost, it is equal to {\ttfamily VK\+\_\+\+NULL\+\_\+\+HANDLE}. \mbox{\Hypertarget{structVmaAllocationInfo_a7f6b0aa58c135e488e6b40a388dad9d5}\label{structVmaAllocationInfo_a7f6b0aa58c135e488e6b40a388dad9d5}}

\index{memoryType@{memoryType}!VmaAllocationInfo@{VmaAllocationInfo}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{memoryType}{memoryType}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily uint32\+\_\+t Vma\+Allocation\+Info\+::memory\+Type}



Memory type index that this allocation was allocated from. 

It never changes. \mbox{\Hypertarget{structVmaAllocationInfo_a4a3c732388dbdc7a23f9365b00825268}\label{structVmaAllocationInfo_a4a3c732388dbdc7a23f9365b00825268}} 
\index{VmaAllocationInfo@{VmaAllocationInfo}!offset@{offset}}

\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{offset}{offset}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily Vk\+Device\+Size Vma\+Allocation\+Info\+::offset}



Offset into device\+Memory object to the beginning of this allocation, in bytes. (device\+Memory, offset) pair is unique to this allocation. 

It can change after call to vma\+Defragment() if this allocation is passed to the function, or if allocation is lost. \mbox{\Hypertarget{structVmaAllocationInfo_a17a39eb34201a610347acb91b38eca79}\label{structVmaAllocationInfo_a17a39eb34201a610347acb91b38eca79}} 
\index{VmaAllocationInfo@{VmaAllocationInfo}!pMappedData@{pMappedData}}
\index{pMappedData@{pMappedData}!VmaAllocationInfo@{VmaAllocationInfo}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{pMappedData}{pMappedData}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily void$\ast$ VMA\+\_\+\+NULLABLE Vma\+Allocation\+Info\+::p\+Mapped\+Data}



Pointer to the beginning of this allocation as mapped data. 

If the allocation hasn\textquotesingle{}t been mapped using vma\+Map\+Memory() and hasn\textquotesingle{}t been created with \#\+VMA\+\_\+\+ALLOCATION\+\_\+\+CREATE\+\_\+\+MAPPED\+\_\+\+BIT flag, this value is null.

It can change after call to vma\+Map\+Memory(), vma\+Unmap\+Memory(). It can also change after call to vma\+Defragment() if this allocation is passed to the function. \mbox{\Hypertarget{structVmaAllocationInfo_ad0ea9d64dd733ffd7beff7af6d289ad0}\label{structVmaAllocationInfo_ad0ea9d64dd733ffd7beff7af6d289ad0}}

{\footnotesize\ttfamily void$\ast$ VMA\+\_\+\+NULLABLE Vma\+Allocation\+Info\+::p\+User\+Data}



Custom general-\/purpose pointer that was passed as \mbox{\hyperlink{structVmaAllocationCreateInfo_a74e2eb74b3772b657c59473ce605058a}{Vma\+Allocation\+Create\+Info\+::p\+User\+Data}} or set using vma\+Set\+Allocation\+User\+Data().
